name: Hentai Collection: Memory
description:
Hentai Collection: Memory is the first in our planned series of simple relaxing puzzle games focusing on simplistic gameplay and design.

In Hentai Collection: Memory you play memory puzzles that grow in size as you get further into the game. After every puzzle you unlock pictures of sexy girls that get more lewd as you go along.

After beating all puzzles you get access to randomly generated puzzles of all shapes and sizes.

From the gallery you can see all images you unlocked in full size and replay the games associated with the image.

features

  • More than 45 campaign puzzles all with unique images
  • Exciting voice acting
  • View unlocked images and replay finished puzzles
  • Play randomly generate puzzles
  • Unlock Steam achievements as you play
  • Scale to any resolution (Even in landscape and portrait mode)
  • With adjustable background music, dialog and sound effects.

system Requirements

The game is build uppon our propiatary engine created in the WPF framework enabeling the game to run on most hardware that runs windows 7/8/8.1/10
